title: HSBC bets big on India's $400 billion pile of wealth
description: The bank is planting its sights more firmly on the ultra-rich in India, where the wealth held by billionaires has crossed $400 billion from $148 billion in 2016.It also plans to launch an onshore private banking service in the South Asian country this year
